meanings.definition: Resembling or characteristic of a beach.
meanings.sent1: The sandy shore had a beachy feel with seashells scattered around.
meanings.sent2: The beachy scent of sunscreen filled the air as families enjoyed the sun.
meanings.sent3: The beachy decor in the restaurant made customers feel like they were dining by the ocean.
meanings.sent4: Her hair, tousled by the wind, had a beachy look that reminded him of summer days.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the beachy colors of the sunset in his painting, creating a serene scene.

meanings.definition: Relating to or located near a beach.
meanings.sent1: The beachy resort offered stunning views of the ocean from every room.
meanings.sent2: The beachy town was bustling with tourists during the summer months.
meanings.sent3: The beachy breeze carried the sound of seagulls and crashing waves to their ears.
meanings.sent4: The beachy atmosphere of the party made everyone feel relaxed and carefree.
meanings.sent5: The beachy vibes of the coastal town inspired her to start a seashell collection.
